UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
UnitType.Backstory: This is your point of no return Now we are ready to strike, again It's getting far too late, my friend Let The Hammer Fall.

UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
UnitType.Backstory: To live again We must grow again To be like the acorn We state with certainty; 'Though I may be just a small thing I dream of mighty forests'.

UnitType.Description: Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
Use scouts to explore the world.
Pioneers are equipped with the necessary supplies to start new settlements and create outposts.
UnitType.Backstory: Men have good intentions on their way to the light. But some of them are venal and end up in the night. Maybe it's better for you, mankind, not to know what's going on.

UnitType.Description: Use scouts to explore the world.
